text: Maria Izildinha "Zizi" Possi (, born March 28, 1956) is a Brazilian singer from São Paulo, the daughter of Italian immigrants. She sings in Portuguese, English, and Italian languages. Possi is openly bisexual. She is the mother of another famous Brazilian singer, Luiza Possi. ==Discography== All albums are in Portuguese unless noted otherwise. *1978 – Flor do Mal *1979 – Pedaço de Mim *1980 – Zizi Possi *1981 – Um Minuto Além *1982 – Asa Morena *1983 – Pra Sempre e Mais um Dia *1984 – Dê um Rolê *1986 – Zizi *1987 – Amor e Música *1989 – Estrebucha Baby *1991 – Sobre Todas as Coisas *1993 – Valsa Brasileira *1996 – Mais Simples *1997 – Per Amore – Italian *1998 – Passione – Italian *1999 – Puro Prazer *2001 – Bossa *2005 – Pra Inglês Ver... e Ouvir – English – live *2014 – Tudo Se Transformou – live DVDs *1998 – Per Amore (initially issued on VHS) *2005 – Pra Inglês Ver... e Ouvir *2010 – Cantos & Contos, Vol. 1 *2010 – Cantos & Contos, Vol. 2 ==References== * Official website of Zizi Possi Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Bisexual musicians Category:Bisexual women Category:Brazilian female singers Category:Brazilian mezzo-sopranos Category:Brazilian people of Italian descent Category:Singers from São Paulo Category:LGBT musicians from Brazil Category:LGBT singers Category:Música Popular Brasileira singers Category:Italian-language singers Category:20th-century Brazilian singers Category:20th-century women singers
title: Zizi Possi
